mapper.select: SELECT LOGIN_ID, SESSION_ID, OFFICEER_TOKEN, ATTENDEE_TOKEN, ADMISSION_ID, USE_END_DD, REG_DT FROM telehealth where LOGIN_ID = #{loginId} and USE_END_DD is null OR USE_END_DD = '';
SELECT LOGIN_ID, SESSION_ID, OFFICEER_TOKEN, ATTENDEE_TOKEN, ADMISSION_ID, USE_END_DD, REG_DT FROM telehealth where ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} and USE_END_DD is null OR USE_END_DD = '';
mapper.insert: insert into telehealth (LOGIN_ID, SESSION_ID, OFFICEER_TOKEN, ADMISSION_ID, REG_DT) values (#{loginId}, #{sessionId}, #{officerToken}, #{admissionId}, now())
